Text.text: Developed a full-scale business software system which can dynamically generate user-interface content, has a dynamically adjustable database, and dynamically-driven application logic - all of which work together to provide a platform that will scale on demand and learn from it's mistakes.

This included the design, configuration, and development of the infrastructure (Linux, Amazon Web Services, NodeJS), database (SAP HANA and Redis), software engine, user interfaces with UI5/Fiori, and security model (authentication, session management, roles and responsibilities).
